required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Efficacy and Operability of Using the New Tissue Containment System During Laprascopic Hysterectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Safety, Efficacy and Operability of Using the New Tissue Containment System With Hard Pipes Which Can Assemble With Detachable Trocars Seamlessly for Tissue Removal During Laprascopic Hysterectomy

brief_summary.textblock: The study is designed to evaluate the safety, operability and efficacy of performing the new tissue containment system during laparoscopic hysterectomy. Pre- and perimenopausal women undergoing laparoscopic hysterectomy.

primary_outcome.description: Exposure is defined as "disruption of the device (using dye leak testing or water testing) or visible tissue dissemination".

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within one day after the surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Mean procedure time will be measured by hour/minutes.

secondary_outcome.measure: The probability of failure during in-bag morcellation procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Failure is defined as the operator's inability to successfully insert and extract the device.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within one day after the surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Blood loss during operation will be measured by volume (mL)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within one month after the surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The patients' post-operative pain will be measured by The Visual Analog Score （VAS).The maximum value is 10 and the minimum is 0. The lower score means a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of intra- or post-operative complications
secondary_outcome.description: Intra or post complications rate (e.g. urinary, intestinal or nerve injury)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within one week after the surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The Surgery Task Load Index will be measured by questionaire. The maximum value is 120 and the minimum is 0. The higher score means a worse outcome.

The patients' life quality will be measured by The World Health Organization's Quality of Life Questionnaire-Brief Version（WHOQOL-BREF).The maximum value is 120 and the minimum is 0. The higher score means a better outcome.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Using the New Tissue Containment System group
arm_group.description: using the new tissue containment system during Laparoscopic Hysterectomy. The divice is a soft specimen bag in which the uterus tissue is sealed and quickly morcellation and removed through vagina. The divice is named the new tissue containment system.
Without using any procteciton system during Laprascopic Hysterectomy.

intervention.description: Using the new tissue containment system during Laparoscopic hysterectomy. The divice is a soft specimen bag in which the uterus tissue is sealed and quickly morcellation and removed through vagina. The divice is named the new tissue containment system.
intervention.arm_group_label: Using the New Tissue Containment System group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pre- and Peri-menopausal woman patient age 18-65 years
- Women with fibroids, adenomyosis, and endometrial hyperplasia and indication for laparoscopic hysterectomy.
- Normal Pap smear result within one year
- The uterus is larger than 12 weeks of gestation
- The body mass index of the patients is 18.5-27.9kg/m2
- Signed informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women with Known or suspected malignancy
- patients during pregnancy and lactation
- Known blood diseases, bleeding coagulation disease, any part of the active bleeding or bleeding tendency of the constitution of the patient
- Patients with known severe liver and kidney dysfunction;Liver function (ALT, AST) ≥ 2 times of normal upper limit, or renal function (Cr) ≥ normal upper limit
- Patients who are known to have participated in any other clinical trial within 3 months
- Patients who cannot sign informed consent
- Patients with acute stage infection of the reproductive system or other sites

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD will to be shared with other researchers after four years
